about_the_game:
"Requiem of Reuinis" is a magictower-style RPG where players take on the role of Tassia and her companions, gradually uncovering the truth of a lost history.

Game Features:

  • Zonal Exploration: Players can collect resources in different areas and retreat at any time, without worrying about getting stuck due to operational mistakes!

  • Alchemy and Research: Players can obtain advanced resources through alchemy using exploration materials, or conduct various research to gradually enhance their strength.

  • Deep Customization: Nearly 300 equipment pieces and 100 skills, with numerous playable builds, allowing players to create their unique completion strategy.

  • Multi-layered Narrative: The stories of the protagonist group, knight orders, and the church intertwine to reveal the truth of the【Calamity】

Game Controls:

  • Game supports mouse play

  • WASD/Arrow Keys: Movement

  • Spacebar: Trigger event/Confirm

  • Esc: Cancel

  • Backspace: Undo

  • Z/X/C/V: Skills

  • Alt: Outlook

  • Ctrl: Skip dialogue

  • Shift: Run
